pages.text: The Engineer's Hammer is the most important tool at your disposal. It will be used to form multiblocks, crush ores into grit, and configure blocks.

The Wrench is a multi-purpose tool for working with kinetic contraptions. Shift-right-click with it to dismantle kinetic components.$(br)It can also be used in place of the Engineer's Hammer in some cases.
Wearing the Engineer's Goggles will allow you to see more details about your kinetic components.
The Engineer's Screwdriver is another common item in your toolbox, which you'll need to do precise configuration on certain pieces of machinery.
Super Glue allows you to connect large structures to your $(l:kinetic_machines/contraptions)contraptions$().
